Generation of time-dependent CCI and comorbidities from the Charlson Comorbidity Index

cci_timR.Rd

Generation of time-dependent CCI and comorbidities from the Charlson Comorbidity Index

Usage

cci_timR(
  data,
  interval = 365.25/2,
  structure = "binned",
  format = "long",
  comorb = F
)

Arguments

data

Full LPR dataset

interval

Interval in which the CCIs should be calculated

structure

Whether CCI should be the full 18 parametres or binned into 1, 2-3, 4-5 and 6+

format

Whether the output should be in long or wide format

comorb

Whether the specific comorbidites in the CCI score should be extracted. Default is FALSE.

Value

cci_full_long/wide: Dates of all CCI scores. Repeted scores in adjacent rows are removed as the status is not changed. cci_bin_long/wide: Same as cci_all with CCI scores binned 1, 2-3, 4-5 and 6+ comorb_long/wide: Dates of all comorbidites
